item.title: Photographer and videopher - Upwork
item.description:
Hiring: Event Photographer & Videographer for
Sial interfood

Location: Jakarta
Dates: November 13-16

Overview:
We're seeking a skilled photographer and videographer to be a part of our pavillion in Fancy Food Show Jakarta, a premier event in the gourmet food industry.

Photographer Duties:

Capture and edit 150-180 photos daily.
Videographer Duties:

Produce two promotional videos daily.
Requirements:

Proven portfolio in event photography/videography.
Proficiency in editing tools.
All files should be sent at the end of the same day


Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:58 UTC
Category: Local Photography
Skills:Photography, Photo Editing, Image Editing
Skills: Photography, Photo Editing, Image Editing
Country: Saudi Arabia
click to apply

item.title: World of Warcraft Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an editor to help me with creating World of Warcraft long form videos. The content will vary from well detailed guides, to highlights from livestream broadcasts. You'll need a strong understanding of the game to be successful in this position.

Ideally looking for someone who is good at taking initiative on projects, and is creative with solutions. I'll be working with you directly to provide ideas for videos.

Preferably experienced in Adobe Premiere, and After Effects, but other editing software could be fine.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube channel video editor for Language learning - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who will become the video editor for our brand new Youtube channel that talks about Japanese language learning, and tutorials on how to use our web app.

Who we look for:
- creative with their editing
- experience with motion graphics
- skilled in creating own graphics
- experience editing videos with this quality: https://youtu.be/6M6FHSVmKqk
- experience with both short and long form engaging video content
- familiar with language learning apps

bonus:
- have learned a new language before
- knows some Japanese or are into Japanese culture

Responsibilities:
- edit Youtube videos and Youtube shorts



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Editor for Beauty Video Templates in Canva - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content editor to create visually appealing video templates for beauty content and product promotions using Canva and other video editing tools. The content editor will be responsible for editing and managing the content pipeline to ensure high-quality and engaging videos. As a content editor, you should have a strong eye for design, a good understanding of beauty content, and proficiency in using video editing software and Canva. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and a creative mindset to deliver innovative templates that resonate with our target audience. Excellent time management skills and attention to detail are a must.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Content creation
- Canva
- Design
- Beauty industry knowledge

Full Visual Reference Library for templates:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qt61SF3o-dtIH2E5Wq0q3Kvtnc7peUEJpcTQsa6f2aA/edit?usp=sharing

Hourly Range: $6.00-$7.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Voice Over for YouTube Automation (FOOTBALL) - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to hire an voice over actor for a Football YouTube Automation Channel. Videos similar to:

https://www.youtube.com/@pedtalkssports/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@TopBinsFootyy/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@WoklzFootball/featured
https://www.youtube.com/@WowFootball90/featured

If you have experience recording voice overs for YouTube channels, feel free to apply and let's talk more details!

P.S: If you CURRENTLY work with successful YouTube football channels, it is an advantage!
Native UK/US voice is a plus.

This is a long term collaboration with good payment structure.

Looking forward to working with you,
Viorel

Hourly Range: $20.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:28 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Male, US English Dialect
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Male, US English Dialect
Country: ROU
click to apply
